export default function useShowNow(picker,mode,showNow,showToday,rangePicker){if(mode!=='date'&&mode!=='time'){return false;}if(showNow!==undefined){return showNow;}// Compatible with old version `showToday`
if(showToday!==undefined){return showToday;}return!rangePicker&&(picker==='date'||picker==='time');}
